content: This application was designed to provide users with a convenient way to translate text using their camera and to share it with others using QR codes. Our goal is to make communication across different languages easier and more accessible. With our app, you can quickly and accurately translate text in real-time and then share it with anyone you like. We believe that this technology has the potential to break down language barriers and create a more connected, global community. Thank you for choosing our app and we hope that it helps you in your everyday life
creator: Maksim Syramalotau
